device_id.label: Device ID
device_id.help: The device ID broadcasted by the device itself.

display_name.label: Display Name
display_name.help: Display name broadcasted by the device itself during discovery phase.

max_tx_data_size.label: Transmit buffer size
max_tx_data_size.help:
Size fo the device transmit buffer.
Limits the size of the payloads that can be sent by the device to the server.

max_rx_data_size.label: Reception buffer size
max_rx_data_size.help:
Size fo the device receive buffer.
Limits the size of the payloads that can be sent by the server to the device

max_bitrate_bps.label: Max bitrate (bps)
max_bitrate_bps.help:
Maximum bitrate requested by the device.
 The server will try to respect this limitation.

rx_timeout_us.label: RX timeout
rx_timeout_us.help: Reception timeout. If no data is received during that period of times, the frame reception is reset and previous data discarded. The following data will be considered to be part of a new request.

heartbeat_timeout_us.label: Heartbeat timeout
heartbeat_timeout_us.help:
Session disconnection timeout.
If the device receives no heartbeat request for that amount of time, the device will disconnect and the communication session will be destroyed.

address_size_bits.label: Address size
address_size_bits.help: Size of pointers used by the device.

protocol_version.label: Protocol Version
protocol_version.help: Scrutiny protocol version used by the device to communicate with the server.

supported_feature_map.label: Supported features
supported_feature_map.help: List of supported features by the device.

readonly_memory_regions.label: Read-only memory regions
readonly_memory_regions.help: List of read-only memory regions. These region cannot be written through Scrutiny.

forbidden_memory_regions.label: Forbidden memory regions
forbidden_memory_regions.help: List of forbidden memory regions. These region cannot be read or written through Scrutiny.
